author: Alex Evans
description:
A key stop on my Gen Con travels this year was to check out Modiphius' new DOOM board game; we still don't yet know exactly when it'll come to Kickstarter, but I couldn't miss the chance to test it out in the (prototype) flesh. From the initial pitch, I expected Doom: Arena to be  a quick playing, blunt, uncomplicated bloodbath, with as few rules and mechanics as possible. And, reader, that's exactly what this is. Sort of.

Continue reading The new DOOM board game is simple as all hell, and that's bloody brilliant
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: The new DOOM board game is simple as all hell, and that's bloody brilliant

author: Timothy Linward
description:
If you’ve slept on ace multiplayer FPS Warhammer 40k Darktide, now is the time to jump on board, as it’s hit its highest discount ever on the Fanatical webstore. You can grab a Steam key for Darktide for just $15.99 (£13.19), or $20.99 (£17.49) for the upgraded Imperial Edition - and unusually, this is a game where I’d recommend you consider that enhanced edition.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Darktide just hit its lowest price ever
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k Darktide just hit its lowest price ever

author: Chloe Ward
description:
If you’re a fan of the Star Wars universe and have not yet jumped on the Star Wars: Unlimited TCG bandwagon, now is the time, as you can purchase a two-player starter set from the third expansion, Twilight of the Republic, at 21% off. It's a cheap introduction to a popular Star Wars game.

Continue reading Grab a Star Wars Unlimited starter pack at a big discount if you're quick
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best card games, Best Trading Card Games, MTG release schedule
title: Grab a Star Wars Unlimited starter pack at a big discount if you're quick

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Wizards of the Coast is making a “conscious effort” to put flavor text on more Magic: The Gathering cards, at least that’s what a post by head designer Mark Rosewater suggests. On his Blogatog blog on August 6 he wrote: “We are making a conscious effort to prioritize having more cards with flavor text.” See? I told you.

Continue reading The decline of MTG flavor text might finally be over, hints head designer
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: The decline of MTG flavor text might finally be over, hints head designer

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The DnD Rogue presents a wealth of different play options, allowing you to be a dashing thief in one game, a grim assassin in the next, and then a spirit medium or swashbuckling pirate. With the Rogue 5e class, you have your pick of spells, skills, and sneaky attacks - and any party will be glad to have you. This guide is a deep dive into the shadows, giving you everything you need to form your Dungeons and Dragons Rogue.

Continue reading DnD Rogue 5e guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Rogue 5e guide

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Japanese Pokémon TCG wholesalers have confirmed a new premium set, MEGA Dream ex, will launch on November 28 this year, headlined by a new Mega Dragonite ex card and packed with plenty of other Mega evolutions. That means the huge angel-winged Dragon will swoop into the TCG less than two months after it makes its debut in upcoming Switch game Pokémon Legends Z-A.

Continue reading Pokémon TCG will get Mega Dragonite just one month after the videogame
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Pokémon TCG will get Mega Dragonite just one month after the videogame

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Thanks to Ravensburger, we’ve got two new Disney Lorcana cards to show off from the upcoming set, Fabled. These exclusive reveals include a new Legendary action and a new Super Rare character, and we reckon both have real potential to see play.

As Fabled is primarily a reprint set, there aren’t a huge number of new cards coming, which makes each one that much more exciting. So let’s move right along and take a look!

Continue reading Exclusive Lorcana card reveal: Circle of Life can resurrect your best character
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Lorcana, Best Lorcana starter decks, Most expensive Lorcana cards
title: Exclusive Lorcana card reveal: Circle of Life can resurrect your best character

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Artist RJ Palmer shared new official art of Dungeons and Dragons’ gem dragons to Bluesky in late July and early August. These gorgeous redesigns will feature in The Book of Dragons, an illustrated guide to the iconic monsters that releases on August 19.

Continue reading DnD artist shares dazzling new gem dragon art for upcoming book
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD artist shares dazzling new gem dragon art for upcoming book
